TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ServiceControllerStatus extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Indicates the current state of the service.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The ServiceControllerStatus enumeration is used by an instance of the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController> class to indicate whether an existing service is running, stopped, paused, or whether a Start, Stop, Pause, or Continue command is pending.
## Examples The following example uses the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController> class to check the current status of the TelNet service. If the service is stopped, the example starts the service. If the service is running, the example stops the service.
[!code-cs[ServiceController#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.serviceprocess._7_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[ServiceController#2](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.serviceprocess._7_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[ServiceController#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.serviceprocess._7_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerStatus ContinuePending = int32(5)

Docs.summary: The service continue is pending. This corresponds to the Win32 constant, which is defined as 0x00000005.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerStatus Paused = int32(7)

Docs.summary: The service is paused. This corresponds to the Win32 constant, which is defined as 0x00000007.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerStatus PausePending = int32(6)

Docs.summary: The service pause is pending. This corresponds to the Win32 constant, which is defined as 0x00000006.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerStatus Running = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The service is running. This corresponds to the Win32 constant, which is defined as 0x00000004.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerStatus StartPending = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The service is starting. This corresponds to the Win32 constant, which is defined as 0x00000002.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerStatus Stopped = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The service is not running. This corresponds to the Win32 constant, which is defined as 0x00000001.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerStatus StopPending = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The service is stopping. This corresponds to the Win32 constant, which is defined as 0x00000003.
